genre_description: A Sherlock Holmes mystery set on a train, blending classic detective tropes with a technological element in the form of a portable AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Clara (Miss Whitfield)
ai_characters.description: An AI contained in a small silver case carried by Dr. Watson, providing data, analytical support, and emotional guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time manifest and compartment data to Holmes and Watson to track passengers.
behaviors.quote: Declared compartments... Lady Margaret Carstairs and son: adjoining sleeping compartments in the forward second coach.

behaviors.description: Analyzes chemical residues and identifies the rare poison used in the murders.
behaviors.quote: Likely curare-derivative. Onset rapid. Avoid mouth-to-mouth—do not risk mucosal exposure.

behaviors.description: Cross-references passenger alibis with train logs to identify inconsistencies and arranged timelines.
behaviors.quote: The times don’t match naturally, John. Duncan-Bleek’s alibi aligns with his charm. Vivian’s aligns with duty. Lady Margaret’s—solid as carved marble. It feels arranged.

behaviors.description: Coaches Watson on how to provide emotional support and mercy to a distressed witness.
behaviors.quote: She is on the brink, John. A kindness now costs nothing and may cost less later.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical warnings and spatial awareness during a blackout and physical struggle.
behaviors.quote: Now, Doctor... He is between you and the right jamb. Step left.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistical support for a victim's daughter, including burial and legal arrangements.
behaviors.quote: Your mother is entitled to a burial that obeys your love for her and the law’s requirements. The local chapel in Inverness has ground available and a curate who will see you this morning.

project_assessment.explanation: Clara is a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned AI. She functions as a 'blue fairy' or conscience for Watson, augmenting human capability without ever threatening human agency. She provides life-saving information, detects deception, and encourages compassionate outcomes, directly supporting the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
